tweet: Our diverse arts community attracts many thousands of visitors to our state every year, contributes significantly to our economy, and connects us all to our rich multicultural traditions. Art and culture is synonymous with New Mexico.

I’m excited to be in Santa Fe and Albuquerque this week to host Celebrating Culture: Workshops Supporting New Mexico Arts. My goal is to use these workshops to connect our state’s arts organizations and artists to federal, local, and private resources. pic.twitter.com/fZkXqHnven
